sentences.sContent: At one point you hear a rattling noise, assume its an enemy only for a rat to jump out and scutter away.
sentences.sContent_eng: At one point you hear a rattling noise, assume its an enemy only for a rat to jump out and scutter away.
sentences.sCn: 比如，你听到了嘎嘎声，以为是个敌人结果发现只是只老鼠跳了出来然后逃走了。
